nodes.text: A Pursuer-class enforcement ship belonged to the Mandalorian Death Watch member Hudu Shiv. He used the vessel during an assassination in 22 BBY. Shiv used the vessel as a decoy and it was destroyed by the transport Hasty Harpy; this successfully fooled the Jedi Padawan Nuru Kungurama into thinking Shiv was dead.
Hudu Shiv and his vessel appear in Ryder Windham's 2011 book The Clone Wars: Secret Missions 3: Duel at Shattered Rock.
